thread.title: Egyptian court gives Christian Copt civil servants a month's paid leave to visit Jerusalem - Egypt - Haaretz
thread.title_full: Egyptian court gives Christian Copt civil servants a month's paid leave to visit Jerusalem - Egypt - Haaretz

author: Haaretz Feb
title: Egyptian court gives Christian Copt civil servants a month's paid leave to visit Jerusalem - Egypt - Haaretz
text: > Egypt Egyptian Court Gives Christian Copt Civil Servants a Month's Paid Leave to Visit Jerusalem The court said the Egyptian constitution guarantees the group the same rights as Muslim civil servants who get a month off once in a lifetime to undertake the pilgrimage to Mecca.
